text: Had a Apiphany  May save me you So I ve been suicidal  been really struggling finding meaning in my life  Awoke from a cult and now all feels hopeless and pointless  I just realized I have been looking at life all wrong   The reason imho why everyone is miserable is because the world in which we live is based on greed ultimately  We may not start out that way but the way we are forced to work to make ends meet pretty much makes us this way  My thought is that we are trying to find happiness through personal gain when we should be trying to find it through helping others  Not trying to step on anybody s toes here but the bible does say they re is more happiness in giving than recieving  Now this isn t meant as a reason to go give people stuff but rather to help them  also imho  We each have a perspective on life that is different especially on this subreddit  if we can endure the pain we are going through we will be uniquely equipped to help others to climb the mountain  and then through our actions we can find true meaning  The kind of meaning where you ll be able to look back on your life and say that you really did make a difference  If you can get by with a Toyota Camry why buy a Lamborghini  Such things are pointless in the end and are expressions of selfishness  I ve recently had the thought often that life is too long  but in truth it s too short its only our perspective we have from ours that effects our opinion  If we ve only ever lived for ourselves we will only look for happiness from what we can gain for ourselves from both ourselves and those around us  You see if we live for ourselves we are never helping others  which is the true path to happiness   Anyway this got long  if your still with me thanks for listening   I hope it makes sense  peace
summary: There is more happiness in giving than receiving, according to the bible. Life is too short and we should focus on helping others rather than on self-gain. Life's too short to live for self-gratification, but for helping others.
cleaned: happiness giving receive accord bible life short focus help self gain life short live self gratification help

text: My Mom SuperstitionsSince I was little my mother has told me of her superstition of seeing a black crow and having it look at her when someone she loves is going to die  It wouldn t caw or make a noise  just turn to her and sit for a short time  She told me this never freaked her out or scared her she just knew and waited to hear the news  It s early this morning and I m in the parking lot of a store stocked up on my favorite drugs hoping to overdose  A few seconds before I m ready to back out of the parking spot I see a crow  It sits on top of the shopping cart return section in the parking lot and it just sits  Strange to me but I don t think anything of it  I get back to my house with the feeling of ultimate nothingness  When my phone rings  My mother  I haven t spoke to her in a time because I recently wrecked my car  Not as a suicide attempt it was truly an accident one where I wasn t injured but totaled my car  Her as well as my dad weren t concerned with me at all  Just the car so I just wasn t really speaking to them  I m   and moved out about a month ago  Anyway I get a call at about  am  She tells me she s sitting on the couch  this is strange in itself for she doesn t usually wake until about   or later  she said she was having bad dreams that I had hurt myself  She didn t specifically say of a suicide just that I took my life  She called and apologized for her behavior  My heart is having stabbing pains  I haven t taken these drugs  Still want to  We ll see  Just a strange story of what happened today  Thank you for your time
summary: My mother has a superstition of seeing a black crow and having it look at her when someone she loves is going to die. This morning she saw a crow sitting on top of the shopping cart return section in the parking lot. Later she called and apologized for her behavior.

text: No reason leftMy life has been spiraling downward for years and every time there is a glimmer of hope for things to get better its crushed by something far worse than the last  Im tired of wasting every day away just wishing I didn t have to see the next one  My family is all gone  Im in a place where I have no one  The pandemic has caused me to lose my job  then my car  and now  Here in a few days I will have lost my place to live  The girl Im in love with could care less if she ever saw me again and would be better off not seeing me anyways  Im tired of hearing all the   get help  bullshit  Talking to someone isn t going to change that I don t want to experience any more of this hell  The only reason I haven t done it yet is because I couldn t imagine not being able to see her face again  I imagine I ll come to my senses soon enough though and realize im not going to see her
summary: My life has been spiraling downward for years. The pandemic has caused me to lose my job, my car and in a few days I will have lost my place to live. The girl I'm in love with doesn't care if she ever saw him again.
